articles.title: VZ Introduces 5G Network Slice Solution: Will it Boost Prospects?
articles.mainIdea: VZ Introduces 5G Network Slice Solution: Will it Boost Prospects?
articles.summary: Zacks: VZ Introduces 5G Network Slice Solution: Will it Boost Prospects?. Verizon launches 5G Network Slice Enhanced Internet, offering capped-free high uplink speeds to support AI, cloud apps and enterprise use cases. Related tickers mentioned: T, T-PA.

articles.title: Here's What to Expect From Verizon Communications' Next Earnings Report
articles.mainIdea: Here's What to Expect From Verizon Communications' Next Earnings Report
articles.summary: Barchart: Here's What to Expect From Verizon Communications' Next Earnings Report. Verizon Communications is expected to release its fiscal fourth-quarter earnings next month, and analysts project a single-digit profit drop.

articles.title: UPS and 11 Other Stocks With Sky-High Dividends and No Clear Answers
articles.mainIdea: UPS and 11 Other Stocks With Sky-High Dividends and No Clear Answers
articles.summary: Barrons.com: UPS and 11 Other Stocks With Sky-High Dividends and No Clear Answers. United Parcel Service has had a devil of a year. While UPS’s dividend yield, one of the highest in the looks tantalizing, Wolfe Research strategist Chris Senyek points out that being in the highest-yielding club doesn’t typically add up to stock market success. Related tickers mentioned: CPB, F, UPS, ^GSPC.

articles.title: 3 Must-Watch 5G Stocks Poised for the Next Growth Wave in 2026

articles.summary: Zacks: 3 Must-Watch 5G Stocks Poised for the Next Growth Wave in 2026. Enterprise 5G use cases, surging data traffic, and major global network deals are setting the stage for ERIC, NOK, and COMM's next growth wave. Related tickers mentioned: ERIC, NOK, T, TMUS.
